text:
[Verse]
City lights they glow so bright
Neon dreams in the night
We walk alone hand in hand
In this concrete fairyland

[Verse 2]
In the distance sirens hum
Through the streets where we come
Whispers echo in the air
Secrets shared just everywhere

[Chorus]
City nights are calling loud
Lost in the crowd
Streetlights shine on you and me
This is where we're meant to be

[Verse 3]
Late night diner coffee steam
Midnight talks like a dream
Sidewalk stories never end
City's song our hearts mend

[Chorus]
City nights are calling loud
Lost in the crowd
Streetlights shine on you and me
This is where we're meant to be

[Bridge]
In the alleys shadows play
Find our way night and day
City pulses beats like drums
In this place life becomes
title: City Nights
